name: Eyeland
description:
Partially complete game - avoid the eyes and make it to end! The game currently only has one area complete - the Ruins. The game is designed to have 4 areas, one in each corner of the Eyeland and each with a distinct theme. Items were to be found in the map (in the opposite corner) and deposited in the eye-pillars of each corner to "win". However, development did not reach that far :).

Example win:

Controls:

  • Camera: Mouse X/Y
  • Movement: W/A/S/D
  • Jump: Space
  • Crouch: L-Shift
  • Crawl: L-Ctrl
  • Exit: Esc

Made in Unreal Engine 5 - all assets except for character mesh are hastily made by me.
